name: Puzzle Protocol
description:
The game is about an Evil AI that has taken over the Facility, You are the only robot not infected by him and is trying to escape, he needs to overcome some challanges by completing puzzle's and avoiding & attacking the Evil Ai's Robots.

We are a small team: DitIsVincent, Sv3r & Quinver

We made this game in 7 Days for the GameJam: Indie Game Dev Beginners #003
